title: Drug abuse: self awareness for high school students - fear
brief_description: John persuades Suzanne to collect a consignment of drugs for him. She, at first unwilling eventually agrees. During the film there are inserts of comments by people on drug taking, trust, child/parent relationships, police, fear, etc.
